title: Wildlife Disease Data Standard
description: Flexible data standard for wildlife disease data

eventBased.description: Whether or not research was conducted in response to a known or suspected infectious disease outbreak, observed animal morbidity or mortality, etc.

archival.description: Whether samples were from an archival source (e.g., museum collections, biobanks).

creators.description: The full names of the creators. Should be in the format familyName, givenName.

titles.description: A name or title by which a resource is known.

publicationYear.description: The year when the data was or will be made publicly available.

rights.description: Any rights information for this resource.

description.description: All additional information that does not fit in any of the other categories. May be used for technical information or detailed information associated with a scientific instrument.

language.description: The primary language of the resource.

fundingReferences.description: Name and other identifying information of a funding provider.
